response.overview: A Moral Dog  Zhou Zhou and Wu Wu grew up together, and they love each other. Lesbians are considered immoral in Chinese society, and Zhou Zhou chose a marriage arranged by her parents. After many years, and she has relationship with her husband, as well as a relationship with Wu Wu too, and she always has nightmares... Big brother Bai and Liu Bei are two young people who are looking for their film dreams in Beijing. They live in a peasant's house with no hope and no future. They wander around like two homeless men.
response.title: A Moral Dog
